item.title: The Political Economy of International Money: In Search of a New Order: Interpretations of a Decade
item.description: Book Chapter: After reiterating her criticism of over-specialisation in the study of international economic relations, Strange goes on to discuss the shortcomings of a large spectrum of perspectives on economic development. The bulk of this article subsequently appeared as chapter three (1986f). Pages: 1-43
